DDL.statement: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_process_order_resource AS ( SELECT APP_PROCESS_ORDER.PROCESS_ORDER, APP_PROCESS_ORDER.MATERIAL, APP_PROCESS_ORDER.STATUS, APP_PROCESS_ORDER.REQUIRED_RESOURCE, APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION as RESOURCE_NAME, APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE.BATCH_SUFFIX, APP_MATERIAL.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL_TYPE, APP_LOCATION.PLANT FROM APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE RIGHT JOIN APP_PROCESS_ORDER ON APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE.REQUIRED_RESOURCE = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.REQUIRED_RESOURCE LEFT JOIN APP_MATERIAL ON APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.MATERIAL LEFT JOIN APP_LOCATION ON APP_LOCATION.LOCATION_ID = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.LOCATION_ID)
